org.usfirst.frc.team302.robot.utilities

Class AngularEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team302.robot.utilities.AngularEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAngleSensor

    public class AngularEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAngleSensor
    This is a math class for encoders. You create this and then call the getAngle method to get the angle that it is reading

    Change Log:

    Version:
    version 1: 2/10/2016 -- Derek Witcpalek -- Original creation of the angular encoder class
    Author:
    Derek
